text: 3. Days 15-28: secretory (postovulatory) phase » Phase that is most consistent in duration « Endometrium prepares for embryo to implant * Rising progesterone levels from corpus luteum prompt: — Functional layer to become a secretory mucosa — Endometrial glands to enlarge and secrete nutrients into uterine cavity — Thickened mucus to form cervical mucus plug that blocks entry of more sperm, pathogens, or debris
